results.name: Fixed point of transformation of the seed sequence {0,2}.
comment: Start with s={0,2} If sum of two neighbor terms sum=s(i)+s(i+1) is even then insert the sum in between, otherwise insert abs(s(i)-s(i+1)); repeat the procedure.
Each row includes the previous one and then continues.
This sequence is analogous to Stern's diatomic series (A002487) but starting with 0,2 instead of 0,1. - _Tom Edgar_, May 08 2015
formula: {s(i),s(i+1)} => {s(i),s(i)+s(i+1), s(i+1)}, if s(i)+s(i+1) is even, otherwise {s(i),s(i+1)} => {s(i), abs(s(i)-s(i+1)), s(i+1)}.
